stimulusHtml: The emphasis of Northern Renaissance humanists on religious themes was most closely connected to their

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the Northern Renaissance.

choicesHtml: concern over the threat posed by the expansion of the Islamic Ottoman Empire
desire to reform what they saw as shortcomings of the Roman Catholic Church
attempts to revive belief in the ancient Greek and Roman gods
hope to create a new religion based on reason rather than tradition
